subject: Re: [junit] Re: Need to get the Error, Failure and the CallStack 	after each testcase run
msgSnippet: I m sorry. There is no way to get the failure trace from within any method marked @Before, @Test, or @After.  There is a way to do it with TestWatchman. Have
messageBody:
I'm sorry.

There is no way to get the failure trace from within any method marked
@Before, @Test, or @After. There is a way to do it with TestWatchman.
Have you tried running the example code from

http://kentbeck.github.com/junit/javadoc/latest/org/junit/rules/TestWatchman.html

David

<gajendran.chandrappa@...> wrote:
